cosc.cosc455.rsanzone.project1

Class Compiler

  • java.lang.Object
    • cosc.cosc455.rsanzone.project1.Compiler

  • public class Compiler
extends java.lang.Object

    The main class of the program. Used as a driver for the lexical, syntax, and semantic analyzers.

    Reads in a .mkd file written in the markdown language and compiles it to html code

    Author:
    Ronald Sanzone

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Compiler.WrongFileNameException
      The Class WrongFileNameException is used a an error generator if the given filename does not end in the proper file extension.

      The semantic analyzer.

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

        The main method.

        Takes in a file name via command line argument. Reads the file to a string and sends it through the three analyzers. In the end a string of compiled html code is written to a file.

        Parameters:
        args - filename

      • isMkdFileName

        private static boolean isMkdFileName(java.lang.String filename)
        Checks if given file name ends in ".mkd".
        Parameters:
        filename - the filename
        Returns:
        true, if is filename ends in ".mkd"
